newsitem.title: ESTONIA: Estonian bus crash kills five children.
newsitem.headline: Estonian bus crash kills five children.

text.p: Five children and three adults were killed in Estonia on Friday when a packed school bus collided with a lorry, rescue officials said.
They said the dead children were aged between 10 and 13.
Prime Minister Tiit Vaehi said it was the "most gruesome" traffic accident in Estonia's recent history.
The accident occurred in east central Estonia near the small settlement of Pala, 160 km (100 miles) from Tallinn as the children were returning from a sports event.
